description: Gold set of real job descriptions for testing skill extraction pipeline

testCases.title: Product Manager
testCases.description:
We are looking for a Product Manager to lead our growth initiatives.

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of product management experience
- SQL and Python proficiency for data analysis
- Experience with product strategy and roadmapping
- A/B testing and experimentation
- HubSpot or similar CRM experience
- Google Analytics 4 (GA4) proficiency

Preferred:
- Tableau or Power BI for visualization
- Strong communication skills
- Leadership experience

testCases.title: Marketing Manager
testCases.description:
Join our marketing team!

Responsibilities:
- Lead lifecycle marketing campaigns
- Manage customer segmentation strategies
- Own CRM strategy and execution

Requirements:
- Expert in Salesforce Marketing Cloud
- Marketo certification preferred
- Experience with customer segmentation
- Lifecycle marketing expertise

Nice to have:
- Excellent teamwork and communication
- Problem-solving abilities

testCases.title: Data Analyst
testCases.description:
Data Analyst - Remote

About the role:
We need a data analyst to help us make sense of our customer data.

You will work on data modeling projects, build dashboards, and perform statistical analysis.

Must have:
- SQL (expert required)
- Python or R programming
- Statistics and data modeling
- Looker or Tableau experience
- Snowflake or BigQuery

Bonus:
- Analytical thinking
- Attention to detail

testCases.title: Growth Marketing Lead
testCases.description:
We're hiring a Growth Marketing Lead!

You'll be responsible for driving user acquisition and retention through data-driven marketing strategies.

What you'll need:
- 7+ years in growth marketing
- Expertise in lifecycle marketing and customer journey optimization
- Deep experience with marketing automation platforms (HubSpot, Marketo, or Klaviyo)
- SQL for campaign analysis
- GA4 and Mixpanel for analytics

What would be nice:
- Optimizely or VWO for experimentation
- Self-starter attitude
- Strong interpersonal skills

testCases.title: RevOps Manager
testCases.description:
Revenue Operations Manager

About Us:
We're a fast-growing B2B SaaS company looking for a RevOps leader.

Responsibilities:
• Design and optimize sales processes
• Manage Salesforce CRM systems
• Build reporting dashboards in Looker
• Analyze revenue data using SQL

Requirements:
- Salesforce Administrator certification
- SQL proficiency (must have)
- Experience with Looker, Tableau, or Power BI
- Revenue operations or sales operations background

Desirable:
- Python scripting
- Great communication and presentation skills

testCases.title: Customer Success Manager
testCases.description:
Customer Success Manager - Enterprise

Join our world-class customer success team!

What you'll do:
- Manage enterprise customer relationships
- Drive product adoption and retention
- Identify upsell opportunities

What we're looking for:
- Experience with Gainsight or Totango
- Salesforce proficiency
- Data analysis skills (SQL preferred)
- Customer lifecycle management

Bonus points:
- Zendesk or Intercom experience
- Strong leadership qualities
- Excellent written and verbal communication

testCases.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
testCases.description:
BI Analyst

We need a skilled BI professional to transform data into insights.

Key responsibilities include building executive dashboards, performing ad-hoc analysis, and maintaining data pipelines.

Required:
- Advanced SQL (3+ years)
- Tableau or Power BI expertise
- Python for data manipulation
- Experience with Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery
- dbt for data transformation

Nice to have:
- Looker modeling experience
- Proactive and detail-oriented

testCases.title: Email Marketing Specialist
testCases.description:
Email Marketing Specialist

Own our email marketing program end-to-end.

You'll craft compelling campaigns, segment audiences, and optimize for conversions.

Must have experience with:
- Klaviyo or Mailchimp
- HTML/CSS for email templates
- Segmentation and personalization
- A/B testing methodologies

Preferred:
- Iterable or Braze experience
- Creative problem-solving
- Team collaboration

testCases.title: Marketing Analytics Manager
testCases.description:
Marketing Analytics Manager

Lead our marketing measurement and attribution efforts.

In this role, you will build attribution models, analyze campaign performance, and provide insights to optimize marketing spend.

Requirements:
- SQL expert (non-negotiable)
- Python or R for statistical modeling
- Google Analytics 4, Adobe Analytics
- Experience with MMM or MTA models
- Amplitude or Mixpanel

Desired:
- Segment CDP experience
- Strong analytical mindset
- Ability to work independently

testCases.title: Demand Generation Manager
testCases.description:
Demand Generation Manager

Drive pipeline through integrated marketing campaigns.

Responsibilities:
- Plan and execute multi-channel campaigns
- Manage paid advertising (Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Facebook Ads)
- Optimize landing pages for conversion
- Report on campaign performance

Required skills:
- HubSpot Marketing Hub (certified preferred)
- Google Ads certification
- LinkedIn Campaign Manager
- SQL for reporting
- Landing page optimization

Nice to have:
- Unbounce or Instapage
- Motivated self-starter
- Excellent time management
